    • Method Detail

      • getUnmanagedImageAsync

        void getUnmanagedImageAsync(java.lang.String url,
                          android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                          android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options options)
        Downloads and sets an unmanaged image, on the provided ImageView, in the background. The image is cached locally on the device. Please note that unlike managed content, partial downloads are not supported for unmanaged content. Also, unlike managed content,, unmanaged content cannot be restricted to be downloaded over WiFi Only. Content will be downloaded over any available network; WiFi or Cellular
        Parameters:
        url - valid http or https url, using HTTP GET
        imageView -
        options - can be set to null

      • getUnmanagedVideoAsync

        void getUnmanagedVideoAsync(java.lang.String url,
                          android.widget.VideoView videoView)
        Downloads and sets an unmanaged video, on the provided VideoView, in the background. The video is cached locally on the device. Please note that unlike managed content, partial downloads are not supported for unmanaged content. Also, unlike managed content,, unmanaged content cannot be restricted to be downloaded over WiFi Only. Content will be downloaded over any available network; WiFi or Cellular
        Parameters:
        url - valid http or https url, using HTTP GET
        videoView -

      • createThumbnail

        android.graphics.Bitmap createThumbnail(long contentId,
                                      ThumbnailTypeVideo thumbnailTypeVideo)
                                        throws ExternalStorageNotReadyException
        Create a video thumbnail for a video
        Parameters:
        contentId -
        thumbnailTypeVideo - supports sizes specified by android.provider.MediaStore.Video.Thumbnails.MICRO_KIND and android.provider.MediaStore.Video.Thumbnails.MINI_KIND
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ExternalStorageNotReadyException
